Summary: They know Im watching them, or could it be they are watching me?
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Decatur
There were no other sightings in Decatur on or around October 10th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsStepped outside at 7:32pm, looked towards the NE, the sky was clear, the bright object that I normally see and watch for was coming towards me, it made no noise, very bright and would brighten even more after it got right above me, I stood there just watching it and taking random pictures of it, then it slowly turned towards the NE, and got real bright again and slowly moved off into that direction, I stood there watching it till it was out of sight. It didn't scare me, I've seen it many times before, but not in awhile, it was like almost telling me; "yes, we are still here, and watching you. The pictures that I have taken along with a short video will not be summited at this time, I can tell you that in one of the pictures you can make out the shape, it looks close to a pinwheel and there is another square object with it in one of the frames, but I did not see the square object when taking the picture.
